about_the_game:
DiggerSim - Excavator Simulator is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

Excavation Tasks

DiggerSim PC offers a wide range of levels that progressively challenge your abilities. Each level presents unique obstacles and objectives that will test your skills to the utmost, ensuring that you don't need to be a professional excavator operator—just plug in and play.

Excavator Movement

With responsive, controls that emulate the real thing, you can take complete charge of your excavator. You'll feel as though you're controlling a heavy machinery thanks to the realistic movement dynamics, whether you're navigating around obstacles. All movements, arm swings, were designed to deliver an authentic and fun experience.

Realistic Digging Mechanism

Discover DiggerSim's actual digging. You can feel the weight of every scoop and bucket movement as you dig trenches, foundations, and more. Because of the mechanics in the game, your actions have an actual impact on the surroundings.

As you progress through the game, you'll have challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

Controller Suggested

To fully appreciate the accuracy and realism of handling heavy machinery, we recommend utilising a controller for the most realistic experience. Every excavation work will feel authentic thanks to the controller's lifelike movements and reactions, which are made easy to use with intuitive controls.

Join our Discord channel!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: DiggerSim - Excavator Simulator

subs.option_text: DiggerSim - Excavator Simulator - PC Edition - $4.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
